author: The Irish Times
title: #ShineYourLight: Tribute to coronavirus victims and frontline workers
description: Hundreds of Irish households shone a light out of their home windows on Saturday at 9pm, as part of a national tribute to those who have died or have been diagnosed with coronavirus, and to frontline workers responding to the outbreak. Taoiseach Leo Vardkar s…
content:
Hundreds of Irish households shone a light out of their home windows on Saturday at 9pm, as part of a national tribute to those who have died or have been diagnosed with coronavirus, and to frontline workers responding to the outbreak.
